attributes.action: The British Government should be taken to the European Courts for the unfair and unjust Police Reform.
attributes.additional_details: I like many other serving police officers feel cheated and robbed by the British Government, who have basically ripped up our contracts. Future plans of paying off mortgages with a commutation package and a half decent pension after putting our lives on the line for thirty years is not a reality anymore.  I for one am not going down with out a fight, for too long now the police have looked after everyone else. Now we need to look after ourselves.

rejection.details: It would be for a relevant body to raise any possible action against the government.
